channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Tivoli Netcool Impact
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Tivoli Netcool Impact

item.title: CVE-2020-4236|2024-08-04T08:00:07.084Z -- ibm -- tivoli%20netcool%20impact
item.description: IBM Tivoli Netcool Impact 7.1.0.0 through 7.1.0.17 could allow an authenticated user to cause a denial of service due to improper content parsing in the project management module. IBM X-Force ID: 175409.

item.title: CVE-2020-4239|2024-08-04T08:00:06.907Z -- ibm -- tivoli%20netcool%20impact
item.description: IBM Tivoli Netcool Impact 7.1.0.0 through 7.1.0.17 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 175412.

item.title: CVE-2019-4570|2024-08-04T19:40:47.674Z -- ibm -- tivoli%20netcool%20impact
item.description: IBM Tivoli Netcool Impact 7.1.0 through 7.1.0.16 generates an error message that includes sensitive information about its environment, users, or associated data. IBM X-Force ID: 166720.

item.title: CVE-2020-4238|2024-08-04T08:00:06.912Z -- ibm -- tivoli%20netcool%20impact
item.description: IBM Tivoli Netcool Impact 7.1.0.0 through 7.1.0.17 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 175411.

item.title: CVE-2020-4849|2024-08-04T08:14:59.075Z -- ibm -- tivoli%20netcool%20impact
item.description: IBM Tivoli Netcool Impact 7.1.0.0 through 7.1.0.19 Interim Fix 7 could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a reverse tabnabbing flaw. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability and redirect a vitcim to a phishing site. IBM X-Force ID: 190294.

item.title: CVE-2020-4237|2024-08-04T08:00:07.346Z -- ibm -- tivoli%20netcool%20impact
item.description: IBM Tivoli Netcool Impact 7.1.0.0 through 7.1.0.17 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 175410.

item.title: CVE-2019-4569|2024-08-04T19:40:47.618Z -- ibm -- tivoli%20netcool%20impact
item.description: IBM Tivoli Netcool Impact 7.1.0.0 through 7.1.0.16 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 166719.

item.title: CVE-2019-4681|2024-08-04T19:40:49.080Z -- ibm -- tivoli%20netcool%20impact
item.description: IBM Tivoli Netcool Impact 7.1.0.0 through 7.1.0.17 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 171734.

item.title: CVE-2020-4235|2024-08-04T08:00:06.971Z -- ibm -- tivoli%20netcool%20impact
item.description: IBM Tivoli Netcool Impact 7.1.0.0 through 7.1.0.17 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 175408.
